document.full_text: a jury was chosen on wednesday for the trial of winifred jiau, a technology consultant embroiled in an insider trading probe tied to so-called "expert networks" that provide industry advice to hedge funds.
document.title: ny jury chosen in consultant's inside trading trial
lines_and_colors: a jury was chosen on wednesday for the trial of winifred jiau, a technology consultant embroiled in an insider trading probe tied to so-called "expert networks" that provide industry advice to hedge funds.
